snippet: NBC has announced that it will team up with the producers of that network’s Broadway drama, “Smash,” to present a new version of “The Sound of Music” for a live program.
abstract: NBC plans a live broadcast of a new version of Rodgers and Hammerstein's 1959 Broadway musical The Sound of Music.
lead_paragraph: NBC has announced that it will team up with the producers of that network’s Broadway drama, “Smash,” to present a new version of “The Sound of Music” for a live program.

headline.main: NBC Plans Live Version of ‘The Sound of Music’
headline.print_headline: NBC Plans Live Version Of ‘The Sound of Music’
